participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, loves exploring new hobbies and spending quality time with family.
participant_1.background: I live in a rural community. I have two kids. I work at amazon. I love robotics.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, enjoys staying active and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: I am 6 foot tall. I love to dance. I have asthma. I like to go running. I used to play hockey.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love to dance, go running, and play hockey.
That's really cool! I love to dance too.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of dancing do you like to do?
I like to do a lot of different types of dancing, but I'm most into hip hop and jazz.
Oh, that's great! I love hip hop too.
Have you ever taken any dance classes?
I have! I took a few years of hip hop classes when I was younger.
That's awesome! I've never taken any dance classes, but I've been thinking about it.
You should definitely do it! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to stay in shape.
Thanks for the advice! I'll look into it.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family.
That's great! I like to do a lot of those things too.
It's nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
It's nice to meet you too!
